X.i.6.B.2.g
.
EP and Claim Label for Pre-Discharge Claims Received Electronically When a Claim Is Already Pending
EP 400 pre-discharge claim label combinations are automatically established by VA electronic claims processing systems when a service member’s claim is filed electronically and another claim is already pending.
Reference
:  For more information on current claim labels and associated codes, see
M21-4, Appendix C, 1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B - Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B
